headline.main: Popeye Poacher Pocock Takes a Stand for Australia
headline.print_headline: Popeye Poacher Pocock Takes a Stand for Australia

docs.snippet: Australia's David Pocock was widely considered the heir apparent to Richie McCaw as the best openside flanker in the world before successive knee injuries robbed him of the best part of the 2013 and 2014 seasons....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia's David Pocock was widely considered the heir apparent to Richie McCaw as the best openside flanker in the world before successive knee injuries robbed him of the best part of the 2013 and 2014 seasons.

headline.main: Peru's Congress Boosts State Energy Firm in Populist Turn
headline.print_headline: Peru's Congress Boosts State Energy Firm in Populist Turn

docs.snippet: Lawmakers in Peru reversed course on state-owned Petroperu's role in upstream businesses and voted on Thursday to remove a legal barrier that kept it from taking control of the country's biggest oil block....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in Peru reversed course on state-owned Petroperu's role in upstream businesses and voted on Thursday to remove a legal barrier that kept it from taking control of the country's biggest oil block.
